duties_responsibilities.duty: Leading a sales team to achieve revenue and growth targets by establishing sales goals and monitoring team achievements.
Coaching AEs on the improvement of specific skills, industry knowledge, and capability knowledge.
Serving as a key driver for setting/surpassing sales objectives and working with key team members in products, marketing, and services to develop market strategies.
Providing accurate forecasts and attracting/retaining all-star account executives.
Participating in the sales process on key accounts and maintaining positive customer relationships.
Ensuring adoption and consistent use of key sales tech stack applications.
